website_summaries.verdict: With four heads and a convenient base, this is a great model for couples or small families.
pros: Includes a travel case, charging base, and four interchangeable heads with different bristle patterns
Charging base can be used to charge a phone or other device
cons: Includes unnecessary features, like a smartphone mount and Bluetooth-enabled app to analyse brushing technique

customer_reviews.title: I do not know why but it says that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why but it says that the battery will last up to 2 week per charge on a twice 2 minute a day usage. I have recently used this and drained the battery then fully charged it (Almost a day to charge!) and less than 4 days I am on 1 battery again. ???
customer_reviews.author: Imran Khan

customer_reviews.title: I was hopeful for better things from this model
customer_reviews.text: We'd owned earlier versions of this brush but had deserted Braun for Philips. Returned to Braun when the Philips brush became very ineffective at cleaning. I was hopeful for better things from this model, despite the unnecessary gimmick of connecting it to my mobile phone. Whoever thought of that nonsense? But after only a couple of weeks, the "Cross Action" head shows significant deterioration, so it looks like Braun have managed to build in obsolescence to their over-priced heads at an even fast rate than before. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: GrahamF49

customer_reviews.title: Switched from a Sonic by Phillips and this is not very nice at all
customer_reviews.text: Noisy violent toothbrush. Switched from a Sonic by Phillips and this is not very nice at all. The noise is unbelievable and the manual is akin to one for a nuclear reactor it is so complicated. Not ergonomic (buttons in bad places) genuinely not a good buy or product.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Best electric toothbrush around!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through so many different brands of electric toothbrushes. This Oral-B Genius 9000 made by Braun is perfect. It has a great travel case which charges the toothbrush and also has a USB socket to charge your portable devices at the same time. The toothbrush itself is very durable and well made. Perfect grip even when completely wet, many different modes and plenty of tooth brush heads available depending on your requirements. I prefer it in black compared to white but its available in rose gold too.
customer_reviews.author: Interloom

customer_reviews.title: Battery was better initially but recently just does not hold its charge
customer_reviews.text: Battery needs charging every two days which is such a pain. I had the philips before this and returned that because the head broke in under a year BUT it was SO much nicer - this toothbrush leaves me feeling plaquey after 4 -5 hours again. Really unhappy, debated and researched extensively before choosing but definitely made the wrong choice. Battery was better initially but recently just does not hold its charge.
customer_reviews.author: lanosp

customer_reviews.title: It teaches you your brushing habits and techniques!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in new. Everything was sealed and I am happy on how this thing is built! It felt tough and unbreakable. It was very powerful, definitely have to go gentle after learning from the mobile app. Gonna bring this wherever i travel as the travel case looks so nice!!! Midnight black has the same heads whereas other colors provide you with different heads to try. The colors are so beautiful!! *adjustable LED color to your preference too!!
customer_reviews.author: Angus Lim

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was crazy spending this much on a toothbrush until it came and WOW !! I had been brushing my teeth wrong for the past 25 years !!! With 6 different functions.. plenty of different modes e.g superclean...advance whitening!! As a ex smoker my teeth became really stained and know whiter within 2 weeks ! Dont be put off by the price ... how much money will you spend on cheap brushes in your life or buy this one and use it for life .....
customer_reviews.author: Joshua_H08

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Doesn't include a UK charger!
customer_reviews.text: Probably would be a nice toothbrush if it came with a UK charger. Mine came with a Continental European one. On top of that the travel"smart" charger doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Shiala

customer_reviews.title: It's stopped working after less than 7 months!
customer_reviews.text: This product has stopped working after less than 7 months!! It won't charge or turn on. Completely dead!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L. A. Hopkinson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Someone asked me if my teeth were veneers the other day. And I drink coffee like crazy, have a sweet tooth and I don’t go to the dentist. It cleans very well. My husband has a cheaper older model and i dont think it’s very different from mine. There are lots of functions I don’t use. I just use the whitening option but there’s a tongue cleaning, sensitive, etc option as well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: false advertising; refusing to pay more money
customer_reviews.text: thanks for this super expensive toothbrush that comes with 0/2 of the chargers needed for the UK. so what, I’m supposed to pay £130-150 on a toothbrush, plus another £40-50 on charges that SHOULD come with it? I think not - RETURN
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it looked very nice. Within a few months, the bluetooth connectivity had failed. When querying in the app page, the response was it must be the fault of my phone (my phone was fine!). Two years later the toothbrush is dead. Will not recharge. My wife had a standard toothbrush (c. £20) which still works fine, I could have got 7 of those for the cost of this overpriced rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Ceribethlem

customer_reviews.title: The charger came with a wrong plug!
customer_reviews.text: The travel charger has a normal plug but the actual charger came with a plug that doesn't fit anything??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forget this if you only want the mobile App function - you won't use it!
customer_reviews.text: Used the bluetooth Mobile phone app gimmick once - then forgot all about it! Impossible to brush your teeth and keep your face in the right position for the app on the mirror. Actual toothbrush works well, but the motor drones.... This is a replacement for a Philips Sonicair Platinum, which was slimmer and sleeker in design, with a better motor sound. We'll wait and see whether this is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Clark

customer_reviews.title: For Me:  THE VERY BEST ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSH IN THE WORLD!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing electric toothbrush. After only being in use for a couple of weeks, my teeth have never looked more naturally whiter, and my gums, with which I had been experiencing problems, no longer bleed and are looking and feeling so much healthier. With the receipt of of this brush, I have also learned to brush my teeth in a much better, competent and individual fashion. This brush exceeds all expectations. I recommend it very, very, very highly. The feel and manoeuvrability of the brush is very comfortable and adept.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic with an arrangement of features with app
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I have always bought Oral- b electric toothbrushes. This one excells in what you can do. It will Teach you how to clean your Teeth properly and monitor this tooth. Gum guard feature is fantastic. Down loads the app from playing Store on a Smart phone Not a tablet and you will be surprised at the arrange features this has and Monitors and legs your own where you are going wronge to.This should be made availableto every child and family. The bright head are smaller than the ones for my earlier toothbrush which makes it easier to get to the back of your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Manuka

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well when it was new but I have noticed with these that the cleaning declines rapidly and after just over a year i am no longer getting a good clean. I recently compared it to a new one i bought for travelling and the difference is very noticeable. The brush which is just over a year old no longer removes stains, whereas the new one does. My sister has noticed the same with hers. For these prices I would expect a much longer usage.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush was working well for the first few weeks, then it wouldn't hold a charge well, until it finally wouldn't charge at all. I don't know whether the toothbrush or charger is faulty, but I'll be looking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bripod

customer_reviews.title: far too powerful and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS ALL ABOUT "BELLS AND WHISTLES"...INCREDIBLY POWERFUL IN A VERY UNCOMFORTABLE WAY. IT HONESTLY COULD LOOSEN TEETH. EXPENSIVE AND WITH LIMITED LIFE, BUT THE BEST...."PHILIPS DIAMOND" £ 130.00 PLUS NEW. PLEASE ,DO NOT PURCHASE AN ORAL B 9000.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R davies

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last well
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these in July 2017 and 2 years later both batteries are losing charge within two days. The battery is actually leaking in one handset and has stained it. Bearing in mind I paid over £100 each I am not at all happy with the lifespan. Have now bought cheaper version in a set of 2. We don't use the smart aspect and never used the travel cases as they are quite heavy for packing and don't work on the adapter we have at home. Worked really well to begin with but the battery life is so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SuBich

customer_reviews.title: it damage my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this expensive product hoping to have better hygiene, first, it was great my mouth felt more fresh and clean. but several weeks later I realized it is damaging my teeth, there is a pressure setting but I can not use it properly. I stopped using it. Now I am using toothbrush again. If you want to use one of these please make sure you learn how to use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: videoblogger

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service and a faulty product
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well initially but after 2 months of use, the battery lost charge within a day. The power output is a lot weaker than what it was. I cannot get in contact with the seller to get a repair done even though the product is still covered under warranty. This is poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: The best tooth brush I’ve EVER owned & in my opinion worth every penny. It’s got every setting you could ever need & im sure the travel case/charger will come in handy when on holiday. Unlike some other reviewers on here I think the phone app is great, I use it all the time & for me it actually makes the process of tooth brushing much more enjoyable. It logs everything you do with your toothbrush & praises you if you’re doing things correctly or makes suggestions if you do anything wrong. It even shows you bits of news/weather etc along the bottom of the screen for you to read while brushing!! Excellent package which I can’t recommend enough A+
customer_reviews.author: Stez

customer_reviews.title: Battery has dies after 18 months of use - poor value
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after 18 months of use. The toothbrush has done an excellent job of keeping my teeth clean and healthy but - I have tried the features requiring bluetooth connectivity but haven't felt it was worth the trouble - is well made - the pressure sensor - tells you when you're pressing too hard - very useful - travel case is excellent - only used 2 of the cleaning modes - the facial recognition stuff is a waste of time - initially the battery held a charge for at least a week but now has died after only 18 months of use and that makes the product abysmal value for money
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could be better designed
customer_reviews.text: Good product this was my first electric toothbrush and definitely get much cleaner from manual brushing the only thing I don’t like and maybe this is a feature on all these toothbrushes is the design allows water to collect on the charger base when you put it back and under the head so if you don’t dry after every time you use it, you will soon see the beginning of mouldy water starting so that’s the only thing that’s annoying otherwise I would buy again the oral b heads are very good and easily purchased separately whichever one you prefer
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Needed charging every 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy but returned to Amazon as it didn't hold a charge. I was having to recharge after 3 days. Wasn't especially impressed with the cleaning capabilities and have now bought a Phillips Sonicare that we had previously had.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not a true "twin" pack
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed as this is not a "twin" pack, rather it has one of everything and a second toothbrush. Unfortunately it will not meet my needs of leaving a toothbrush and associated charger at both places I spend time. I think clearer wording in the advert is a must. Hopefully this review will help others to avoid disappointment from a brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: 15 hours charging time, only 2-3 days working. 2 days with phone app, 3 days if Bluetooth turned off. After again 15 hours charging. Only 1 charger in the box. Only 1 phone holder in the box. The application is useless: - Can not use 2 brush in 1 place, - It have to sync every time with phone, - Can not find my face because the toothbrush is in the way, - I ticked floss yes, but randomly agree it, Useless.
customer_reviews.author: robagp

customer_reviews.title: Good but gimmicks
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement and bought mainly for the li-ion battery and "USB travel charger case". YOU CANNOT CHARGE THIS BY USB. Its just another proprietary charger to add to the drawer that's already full of them for various devices. Bluetooth toothbrushes honestly, completely pointless. Battery life seeems good for now but This is way too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: bawbag2016

customer_reviews.title: Not much different to Oral-B Pro 2 2500N.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that this toothbrush is not that much different to the Oral-B Pro 2 2500N. It's like £50.00+ cheaper and it does everything that this brush does apart from the app. But who really needs an app to tell them how to brush their teeth? When I used it, only 1 second of pressure in one area of my mouth lit the whole area up saying "Too much pressure in this area" even though it was 1 second! And I brushed my teeth for 5 minutes! All you really need is an electric toothbrush with a pressure light on it. The Oral-B Pro 2 2500N is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carr

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and the app does not always work
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what is offers. It is a good electric toothbrush but does not worth the money paid (GBP 140 is what I have paid). I should have bought something for maximum GBP 50 and it would work the same. The app does not always work. I have Samsung S8 and quite often it cannot connect with the toothbrush so all potential benefits of the app are in most cases non-existent. Sometimes it takes me few minutes to connect the phone with the toothbrush...so it is really painful and expensive negative experience. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr13

customer_reviews.title: Simply Genius!
customer_reviews.text: The 9000 is pure genius. I have two other models of lesser specification. Bought the 9000 because one of my older lesser models, the battery was going weak after 3 years. Well, the 9000 has more power and battery lasts longer. For those who enjoy a good scrub of the mouth and teeth this is for you. My teeth and gums feel better compared to lowers spec models for same timed usage. I haven't tried all the fancy features and bluetooth - I'm not that OCD about tooth-brushing. 😊😉 Buy this model with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Walker

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grip degrades over time
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for a little over two years. I always rinse it in cold water and dry it after use. The rubber grip is now decomposing and has a rather manky sticky feel to it. Washing it in mild soap doesn't remove the sticky feeling, which doesn't seem to me to be very hygienic. Some types of rubber do degrade like this over time. Not what I would have expected from a rather expensive product. Now out of guarantee, but I don't think there's any excuse for this. I don't make use of any of the hi-tech functions, so from here on I'll be buying the cheaper Oral-B brushes that actually do the job just as well.
customer_reviews.author: DaveB

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying 2 separate brushes
customer_reviews.text: Toothbrush itself is great(we bought 2 separate brushes) but the deal was not correct. Yes, its cheaper than buying separate brushes but you get only half. Basicaly you get 2 toothbrushes, 1 charger and cheapest travel case withouth possibility of charging. No extra brushes heads and all very minimal. So in the you will netter off buying separated as you get twice more for your money by paying just a little bit extra. Also package came without sticker so it was suspicious that items were used before even if we bought new.
customer_reviews.author: Mantas Vilkelis

customer_reviews.title: Battery is duff after minimal use. Too expensive for this lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: Ordinarily I don't both reviewing after a substantial period as I think reasonable wear and tear comes into play but I think that I feel a touch let down by this product. I'm not sure how long the battery is meant to survive for but mine is essentially dead and it's not yet 2 years old. It's charged, I clean my teeth and it needs charging again. Perhaps I'm being unreasonable but, to have to buy another toothbrush having spent almost £120 on this one less than 24 months ago irks somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: My teeth feel like they’ve been through the car wash
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ! Absolutely love this toothbrush, it really is brilliant and well worth the money. After only a few days my teeth and gums feel so much better, only downside is that it’s quite loud but I’m sure I will soon get used to that. The travel case that comes with it makes it ideal and easy to take away on both business trips and holidays. Comes with 4 toothbrush heads which will keep me going for a while. Love the rose gold colour and personalised pink light that you choose on e you download the oral b app.
customer_reviews.author: Bex2462

customer_reviews.title: Wait when it’s on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Far better then manual brushing but in all honestly have never tried another toothbrush outside of Oral B brand - mostly because I don’t feel I need to. It offers a deeper clean then manual and I’ve gotten used to the ‘rhythm’ of alerts to change sides etc. However I would only buy this if it was a major sale. I got mine for £99. If you’re looking to buy this. Check out Boots or set up a price alert. Amazon knock down the price frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Gogna

customer_reviews.title: Very good Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This was my first high end toothbrush. The bluetooth feature of this along with the app is good to use however slightly gimmicky after a while. The brush itself provides an unreal cleaning - I have used a manual toothbrush a few times since and it just doesn't feel the same. Battery life is good for what I expected. The case has a USB port to charge your phone however this only works when the case itself is plugged in to charge the toothbrush - I was mistakenly under the impression that the case had a battery to charge the brush handle/usb device so a bit pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush but missing one of the toothbrush attachments
customer_reviews.text: I received the toothbrush as a gift for someone. I wanted to check the contents were all there and it seems I am missing one of the toothbrush attachments, there are two of the same brushes but missing one. I have tried to contact the supplier but have not received a response or the missing toothbrush. I have the same toothbrush myself and I really like it so I have bought another as a gift for a family member. I don’t actually use the Bluetooth so I can’t comment on that but overall I am happy with my toothbrush but would be nice to be able to give the gift complete and not missing a brush.
customer_reviews.author: YogiB

customer_reviews.title: box is damaged
customer_reviews.text: disappointing that the box is damaged. was planning to give it as a present....now i am not sure that the brush is without any faults.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Teeth health, you need a toothbrush that does the job so look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Oral b toothbrush twin pack for me and the wife. Fantastic value. Good array of features including- Pro clean Whiting Gum care Sensitive Battery can last up to two weeks. Makes your teeth feel really clean. Also has Bluetooth connectivity to help improve the way you brush your teeth. I’ve used oral b toothbrushes for many year and have never looked back. I’d recommend them as they do help keep your teeth looking good and health.
customer_reviews.author: Bob tries hard

customer_reviews.title: Good solid hardworking electric tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: Good solid hardworking electric tooth brush. If you can remember the advert stating a product cleans your teeth as good as your dentist, this does that and more so (even had a compliment from my dentist about how clean my teeth were). I bought this to replace an original Oral-B toothbrush and you can see and feel the improvements which have been made. Can't say anything about the Bluetooth side of things as I have not felt the need of it and taking a mobile device into a steamy environment......I'll leave that to your imagination and you do have the over pressure alert and it does tell you when you need to move on so what more do you require.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. S. Cottee

customer_reviews.title: Good brush, bad app
customer_reviews.text: It's basically a good toothbrush. However, I've knocked a couple of stars off it as it's app won't work with my bluetooth phone (Moto G5 Plus) on Android v7.0. Apparently, it needs Android version 7.1.1 or greater according to them, although my phone worked with a Genius 8000 okay. This means the extras in the box for attaching the phone to a mirror are useless. The only difference between this toothbrush and the 8000 is the travel case of the 9000 has some sockets for recharging, including USB (which could be useful), whereas the 8000 doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: London user

customer_reviews.title: This is a wow product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from amazon and was sceptical about its claim as it was not cheap. However I was pleasantly surprised with its cleaning power and different brush heads. My teeth feel squeeky clean so much different to an ordinary toothbrush. I have not used it with my mobile because I don't have that kind of time to set up the phone. The charger case is very handy. What would have been helpful is a 3 pin UK plug because I do not have the luxury of a shaver socket.
customer_reviews.author: Annb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great toothbrushes I only buy this brand, I like the fact they remember what the last symbol I was on saving me to keep pushing the button to the one i use. The App worked the 1st time but nothing since, for the price i expected singing n dancing to fireworks, my old toothbrush is a smart connect (battery dies fast now hence the upgrade) to a clock so turn that on just to see the timer going and the smiley face when I'm done :)
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie S

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I went from using a Phillips sonicare, I am really disappointed I did. I have had it for about 6 months now and it last less than a week, even on the standard mode. The timer setting is pointless because it does not turn the tooth brush off, I feel it would be such an easy thing to do. The Bluetooth feature is the definition of gimmick, I used it the first time I got it and never again. The only thing I prefer about oral b over Phillips is oral B’s heads are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Parry

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without it.
customer_reviews.text: I used a manual toothbrush for most of my life, and after someone recommended this product, I thought id try it. Ive not looked back. After brushing, my teeth feel so much cleaner than they ever did with a manual. The mobile phone brush tracking is good to use at first to learn how you should really be doing it. Once you've got the hang of it, the technology has no use. The travel case is perfect, battery lasts 10-14 days and it charges fully in around 6 hours. A must if you care about your oral health
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but questionable brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality toothbrush with top quality features. I've found it cleans markedly better than cheaper models and some features like the battery life indicator are very useful. That said, many of the features included to justify the price just do not carry much value, at least not to me. The software tracking your brushing is novel, but a nuisance to use and of extremely limited use. I bought this brush at a heavily discounted price and do not regret my purchase, but I would never be able to justify paying full price for this. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Eoin O' Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I used to use standard Oral B for many years but it stopped charging, so I had to replace. This one got a good price now comparing to the previous one. I hoped it will come with different head types but it includes 4 standard heads. You need to use it with an app, different settings won't work without it. In general I think it's a good price for value. The plug fits UK shaver sockets, but it's too thick for standard European sockets which is let down for me.
customer_reviews.author: Przemek EU

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the 8000 model
customer_reviews.text: I had the 8000 model and purchased this thinking it is better. The 8000 model is definitely superior and if you are choosing between the two, use this advice to choose. Definitely you get more cleaning power from 8000 and also felt the 8000 has a better battery life. Unlike the older model (6500?) both 8000 & 9000 models use an app as a cleaning assistant which is very inconvenient. The older model included the cleaning guide which is better.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: App is a Waste of time but the toothbrush is good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new toothbrush so jumped in on this oral B Genuis 9000, I had ago on the app but can honestly say I can't believe that a company would waste so much money on it. When you have to mount the phone so it connects to the toothbrush. You are only seeing what you would see in the mirror. So a complete waste of time. But the toothbrush works well so I am overall happy with it. The different modes on the toothbrush work well. The deep clean mode is brilliant your teeth feel like they have had a deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: stuart j c

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been an oral B electric brush fan for years and this one is just as great as the previous one I’ve used but I will ...
customer_reviews.text: **BEWARE THE PLUG IS NOT UK**. I’ve been an oral B electric brush fan for years and this one is just as great as the previous one I’ve used but I will say - fully knowing this isn’t the point - that this brush is absolutely stunning. I love it and the fact that you get a travel case. I am taking one star off because of the non-standard European plug. Why, Amazon UK?! Still haven’t found an adapter to charge the brush. Such a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Infinity

customer_reviews.title: App can be buggy but Toothbrush is great.
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush works perfectly as described and leave my teeth feeling great. The guided brushing is a little buggy (often not recognising which part of my teeth I was brushing) and required me to stand a fair distance form the sink to improve accuracy (when using the mirror mount). The charge / travel case is perfect for storage of the brush and easy to pop in luggage when taking trips. Recent updates to the iOS companion app mean that the health data can be shared with Apple Health too which is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Littlerob5

customer_reviews.title: Very good toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Good value and comes with a selection of heads ( without explanation !). Travel charging box included, and warns you if using too much pressure while brushing, something that I have always done. These are the main reasons I choose this model over the cheaper one. You also get an attachment for positioning your smartphone on your mirror for Bluetooth enabled feedback on your brushing habits- if you feel like you really need it. I had problems registering it online with Oral-B, but the customer support was excellent and immediate, and they did it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to get it during a really good discount, so I definitely feel it was great value for money. Love all the Brushing options. Very easy to use and the app is really great. Personally would have preferred if the charging stand came with a plug that didn’t need an adaptor and as the electrical toothbrush is black, it would of looked nicer if the stand was too. But over all very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H R Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Really not worth the money beware if you have sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting great things from this and I don’t know if mine was faulty or if they are all like this, but the vibration of this brush was so extreme it was giving me a headache, if you have sensitive teeth beware! I don’t expect a electric toothbrush these days to have such extreme vibrations, I have tried but it’s being returned as unusable. I need a brush I can use without worrying whether it’s going to kick off a migraines or tmj issues
customer_reviews.author: K. King

customer_reviews.title: Good brush but don't buy just for app and Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The brush cleans your teeth very well. If you use whitening toothpaste you will see a big difference using this over a manual brush. The battery will last you a week or so. The app and Bluetooth feature are 100% a gimmick, used the app for about a week it is more trouble than its worth, so now I just use it without any app and the battery lasts longer. Overall very good brush although would prefer if there was no Bluetooth or app for a cheaper price
customer_reviews.author: UnNamed

customer_reviews.title: It’s got you covered
customer_reviews.text: The product is unmatched in my opinion - my favourite out of the electric toothbrushes. It connects to your mobile phone (I’m on IOS) quickly and comes with a range of useful features that enhance dental care. You can choose short-term goals to focus on and the accompanying app will take you through and help you achieve it. A very good product
customer_reviews.author: aidarus

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely invest in this
customer_reviews.text: The Oral-B Genius 9000 is a fantastic electric toothbrush that provides you with all the tools you need to maintain healthy teeth and gums. It does have a high price tag however, this is more than offset by the technology and usability of the brush Pros Fantastic cleaning power High Build Quality Stylish and Robust Connects Via Bluetooth to the Oral-B App Tells you which areas of your mouth you are not cleaning Premium Travel Case that charges your electric toothbrush and Smartphone Cons High Price Tag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Lithium Toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a simple lithium battery toothbrush but there aren't any on the market. This is one of the best ones but it comes with lots unnecessary accessories and features. If you want an electric toothbrush with more power than before and faster charging then get this, throw away all the travel charging, wall mounting, brush docking nonsense and turn off the Bluetooth and flashing colors. Set it to the Diamond symbol for max power and you are set. The only button you have to push now is On/Off. Turbo speeds all the time, not just for the first 5 mins after charging like the electric toothbrush had.
customer_reviews.author: Desolate

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe how bad it was
customer_reviews.text: For such a well known brand, and top of the line product, very displeased with this.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: New upgrade brush
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a upgraded tooth brush so got this when it was offer love the colour soft and not hard to use. I must say often I cant be asked to use the app to see how well I clean but it is easy to use just pressing the buttons and effort used doing It. I seem to brush 2 minutes as says but seems to take 4 due to the tooth chart not fully being covered and flashing. Not sure what i am doing wrong there.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Don’t waste you money.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working properly almost immediately spent 90 pounds on this time and it’s a complete waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Fresh Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it would make that much difference but having an electric toothbrush has changed everything lol. This toothbrush is great and I am extremely happy with it. My only gripe is that I don't think 2 minutes is long enough for brushing so I use 2 rounds of the timer function for a 4 minute excellent brush, my mouth and teeth feel amazing afterwards. The battery lasts about a week, not 2, it takes forever to charge but I just leave it to charge overnight every Friday so it doesn't phase me. I wouldn't pay full price for it, I got it for almost a 3rd of full price which seems reasonable. Overall I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pmishka1

customer_reviews.title: A needed upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had an old version of this toothbrush. This was a needed upgrade. Thinks I loved Battery indicator to know when its going empty. My old one was going empty without warning. More powerfull then the old one. Not sure if it was as it was old. Bigger and better grip. The bigger size makes it easier to hold. On click to turn on and off. My old one had you click 4 times to turn on and off. One suggestion for them is to make the charger and toothbrush holder black to match the colour.
customer_reviews.author: Chimra

customer_reviews.title: Expensive cheap tat
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I cant write a fair review as I didn't even try this brush, I knew the moment I opened it that the product was cheap plastic tat - having come from a phillips sonicare I thought I'd give the "dentists choice" a try, but was very disappointed to find it to be a flimsy, plasticky lightweight thing, not what I expect having paid £120. I turned it on and it made a sound like a lawnmower. Instant return I'm afraid - maybe it cleans teeth brilliantly, but I don't see how - its just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shamm

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush I have had so far
customer_reviews.text: This is really a good toothbrush, but you are paying more for the carry case. You can put in case and charge, but I found that it actually charges on my old charger. My wife said something about it not charging in the car from the usb, but this shouldn't be a problem for anyone. Low score for Bluetooth only because for me, this is a bit over engineered. Low score for whiting only because I don't think any tooth brush does much for whitening. No hesitation in recommending this as great tooth brush, but £100 seems quite high to clean your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the price to think it’s a great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this toothbrush, thought with the price and model it would be a faster speed in which the brush moved. Teeth do not feel clean. Always used Phillips sonicare and fancied a change, wish I had not bothered. I want to brush my teeth again in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice build & good results
customer_reviews.text: I had a bit of a mishap with the toothbrush when it first arrived. Out of the box it wouldn't start and when charging it for 20 hours it also wouldnt work. I applied for a repair then about 10 mins later when putting it in the box, I dropped it then some how it started working. My teeth are stained from tea and so far it's doing very well. The all connects well and 3D whitr mode is very good! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Efficient cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This must be our 5th high end Oral B. No doubt about it they are good for cleaning your teeth. The failure in them is always the battery and they are made on purpose so you can't simply replace it. I guess the manufacturers make a good profit with these simple plastic machines.Even though I grumble ,I will buy another when this one goes.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly bad toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, noisy, clunky, toothbrush. The different settings are pretty meaningless. 9 months in and the battery now doesnt last more than a few uses despite having followed manifacturer’s instructions to the letter. Only giving it two stars because it does clean your teeth fairly well on the highest setting, but for the huge cost there are far better options out there. I’ll be going back to a Philips Sonicare as soon as I can afford it!
customer_reviews.author: AYoung

customer_reviews.title: Cleans teeth
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have been over thought. While the novelty of staring at your phone to clean your teeth was fun for first 2 goes. Reality is do you really want a cradle stuck to your bathroom mirror all the time then have to set up phone and app just right or you just want to stick toothbrush in mouth and do exactly the same as you normally do
customer_reviews.author: craig a smith

customer_reviews.title: Best oral B brush I've used -highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Having tried different oral B brushes in the past, this was the best . It is sturdy and well made with a great battery life. The power is impressive and gives a thorough clean. Not oral B electric brushes are the same in terms of power and this is top of the range . I must say i haven't utilised the Bluetooth as much as i should but its definitely not a gimmick and allows polishing teeth, brushing tongue etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nas Reviews

customer_reviews.title: great tooth brushes but expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are great toothbrushes but they do seem a bit over-priced to me. I've not used the Bluetooth features as I'd rather keep my phone well away from a room full of water! The battery does last for ages off of one charge. The brush modes are good to be able to select a harder more vigorous scrub which leaves your teeth feeling squeaky clean
customer_reviews.author: Richard Webb

customer_reviews.title: Not convinient, no good for family. gimmicky.
customer_reviews.text: Having to use your mobile is actually anoying. Position detection relies on the camera, not convinient either. The app regularly crashes in the middle of brushing. No real family option on this to keep track of kids brushing. My old one had a separate timer it and was far more convinient.
customer_reviews.author: Franck Pottiez

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for more than 6 months now, very happy with it and theres a noticeable difference on my teeth. The extra functions arent really necessary but nice to have. The battery lasts about 4 days and I like the app.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling D.

customer_reviews.title: Battery is dead after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I need someone to contact me from support as the battery is dead after 3 months. The reason why I bought it because of my 3 years old Oral-B Genius 6000 had a same issue but after 3 years not 3 months...........have to charge every day.
customer_reviews.author: Akosh

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is amazing, it does last long enough! And it also charges fast. I did see a lot of difference since i used this brush! I think I would never go back to use normal brush anymore! I would recommend this product to all my family and friends fr. the only problem is that the charger is EU i guess? You can get the UK 3 head ones from amazon for £9
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, I’m glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this model as it was a dual pack and was working out cheaper to buy the from a retail store. However after just a few days I’m very impressed. You can really feel the difference (going from standard toothbrush). I haven’t tried all features like the whitening feature etc but my teeth feel much cleaner after brushing. Really happy with this purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Robio

customer_reviews.title: Im happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: I havent used bluetooth not interested in that, bought as my okd electric brush wouldnt hold a charge anymore. It was 10 year old mind. Bought this as a replacement and it just shows how badly mine was functioning in the end. Excellent brush, dont care for bluetooth function, battery life over exaggerated but it charges over night.. great brush
customer_reviews.author: Ray Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible. Buy a better brush elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Battery did not survive 2 brushes, terrible. Really not good when it runs out of battery by morning and you need to do your teeth before work. The Bluetooth works but the app is not very useful and it doesn't really know where your brushing like it claims. Brushes well enough though, teeth felt clean. I work on a farm and this is a busy time of year so missed the return date, if I hadn't I would have returned it in a heartbeat due to the appalling battery life. I'm disappointed Amazon stocks things that falsely advertise their quality (the battery life said hours).
customer_reviews.author: ARKO man

customer_reviews.title: Things you need to know about the set of toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: First, you think the price is a deal for 2 toothbrushes. However, the carry case is absolutely the worst. You can't provide a plastic case as a carry case. I have seen the original Oral-B carry case (when bought as a single toothbrush ) and I have used Philips Diamond 3 Sonicare. They all have premium cases - this feels like it has been delivered from a 1 pound shop. You can't charge, it is a literally a plastic case wannabe. In addition, you get less toothbrush heads and 1 silicon phone handler. I understand these makes sense but at least put in the original carry case not a 1 pound shop replica!!!
customer_reviews.author: Onur Guven

customer_reviews.title: The only brush I will use now!
customer_reviews.text: Best toothbrush I have ever owned. Totally worth the money, the app is a bit of a cliche and i very rarely use it. But love how you can choose to change the colours and how it has the different brush setting, The travel case is fantastic idea and cant wait to use it. The toothbrush charge for me lasts about 3 weeks, and only take a few hours to charge. The only down side is it doesn't give you very much visible warning of it going flat, and then you wlil go to use it and it will die mid brush...maybe if i used the app more it will tell me on this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarj Willett

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Never works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this A) because I'm a techie and B) I didn't feel I was brushing as well as I could. So I bought this toothbrush thinking it may help. First time you use your teeth feel very clean I used the tracking for the first time. Then the next day I used the app and it simply wouldn't connect with the brush, and made it a "dumb" brush, which effectively made it £124 worth of normal electric toothbrush, not the tech packed super advanced brush it was meant to be. However this was only my experience I'm sure a lot people have had no issues at all, but I just felt it was necessary to highlight the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good toothbrush. It has a long battery life. I like the timer function that gives you a signal every 30 seconds and than a long one after 2 minutes. I’m not sure if I liked the app it may be that I didn’t place the phone holder in the right position but it didn’t always read very well toothbrush position. I used the app only for first couple weeks. The travel case is a very good feature. I had a problem with charging plug. All together I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: The twin pack comes with 1 non-USB case, and one normal charger. How am I supposed to charge when I'm travelling? My wife needs the main charger for hers! This twin pack bundle is not thought through at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky clean feel!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a manual toothbrush all my life, which has been the most effective for me personally. I've decided to finally take a step forward and use an electric brush. The difficult question was, determining the right one. I came across the Oral B 9900. It has changed my life for better. The brush itself consists of functions which suit your own personal preferences. It cleans your teeth profoundly and makes them squeaky clean and shiny white. I'm a bit unhappy with advertisements of 2 brushes for 1, as the pack is only equipt with 1 brush worth. However, overall I'm very happy and it has been a long term investment for better.
customer_reviews.author: Terezia

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL PLEASE READ BEFORE BUYING
customer_reviews.text: The worse product I've purchased. Literally after 3 use the toothbrush was heating up and stopped working. When I tried to contact amazon customer service about it, no much help either.
customer_reviews.author: asiri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are some good toothbrushes. You can feel the difference compared to the cheaper versions. My teeth feel very clean and I’ve noticed some changes in whiteness. Never used the Bluetooth or the phone app. Slightly inconvenient that you only get one travel case- we usually travel together so would really prefer two cases over some of the other things such as the wall stand.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good however battery could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad toothbrush. It seems to do a good job on your teeth and with the built in timer it certainly means you have no doubt about how long 2 minutes lasts. The bluetooth element is a little gimmicky and I now just brush my teeth without using it as its a hassle. However my teeth now get the full 2 Minutes morning and night and look whiter for it. Only down side is the battery life doesn't really last 2 weeks. I would say 1 is more accurate. Would recommend though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Almost a year
customer_reviews.text: In December it will be a year since I bought this electric thootbrush. Very pleased with my pucrchase, even though I used all that crap functions maybe for two weeks, after that, just one mode, "deep clean" and maybe from time to time change the colour of the handle. :)) so do not get too excited for all those things it can do, because, in the end, you all going to use just one mode.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Is ok product for the price. If I would be able to change for my Philip’s sonic care I would do it now. When my Philips toothbrush was gone after 4 years I thought I would change for oral b. Oral b is ok. Philips sonic care was amazing and I did see differents
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra N

customer_reviews.title: Charge lasts only five days-not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The battery charge only lasts for about five days-and a full charge takes twelve hours. We replaced a 5000 (dropped by one of the children) with this. The 5000 was better. As for putting the smartphone on the wall...that’s a good way to smash a smartphone. We don’t recommend this toothbrush. The 5000 doesn’t have the gimmicks, cleans well-and is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Stardancer

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush. Lots of useful settings
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic brush although don’t use all the blue tooth stuff. There are settings for different types of brushing and the sensitive one is great for receding gums - the hygienist started giving me 10 out of 10 once I started using this and I only brush once a day! Timer is so handy and the battery lasts a week if used twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Rolander

customer_reviews.title: Case did not charge brush,
customer_reviews.text: Special case did not work - on first one and also on second replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë Tangle

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Only had this toothbrush a couple of months and already it has lost its speed, charging it gives only limited power and have had cheaper brushes that have lasted way longer. Not worth the hassle of getting it repaired will count my losses and buy a more reliable cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstar1970

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush. It performs really well. My dental health is tonnes better in 6 weeks. The different settings are useful but I have not used it with the app yet. The charging travel case is a brilliant idea. This is not a cheap toothbrush however I personally think it has been worth the investment. The current amazon price was very competitive especially as a prime user. It is very noisy however and the replacement heads are generally quite expensive. However overall I would say this is a definite win!
customer_reviews.author: cyberfink

customer_reviews.title: Lovely oral b electric brush in lovely rose gold colour.
customer_reviews.text: My old oral b gave up on me after about 6/7 years (it would need constant charging) so I decided to go for this new one. I love the rose gold colour and it has nice new features and what else to say ?? Whoever uses a oral b electric brushes will know how good they are. This one is very fast and strong brush compared to the cheaper versions of oral b. You can really feel the difference. Will definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hima

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying a sonicare diamond with Phillips that didn't work for me - I can honestly say this is amazing. It connects to the app flawlessly (which the previous brush didn't ) it was sensitive to my cavity striken too (again previous brush didn't do this) and best of all it leaves my teeth feeling clean. Its not as snazzy as other brush aesthetically but it does the damn job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toothbrush when it was on sale for a third of the price and it's worth the money! It's easy to set up and connect to Bluetooth and tracks how you are brushing your teeth- duration, length, surface area and it lights up red when you are applying too much pressure. It has different settings for sensitivity and the battery life on it is great!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

product_meta.title: Oral-B Genius 9000 Electric Rechargeable Toothbrush Powered by Braun - Black

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
